original_text:
Oh that you would hide me in Sheol,
    that you would conceal me until your wrath be past,
    that you would appoint me a set time, and remember me!
korean_text: 주는 나를 스올에 감추시며 주의 진노를 돌이키실 때까지 나를 숨기시고 나를 위하여 규례를 정하시고 나를 기억하옵소서

sentences.original_text: Oh that you would hide me in Sheol,
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 주께서 나를 스올에 숨겨 주시기를

sentences.original_text: that you would conceal me until your wrath be past,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 진노가 지나갈 때까지 나를 가려 주시기를

sentences.original_text: that you would appoint me a set time,
